description: This file defines an interface for payment providers and implementations for mock, Stripe, and Razorpay providers. It also includes a factory function to obtain the active payment provider based on configuration settings.

classes.name: PaymentProvider
classes.description: Protocol interface for payment providers, defining methods for creating payment sessions and verifying webhooks.

classes.name: MockProvider
classes.description: A mock implementation of PaymentProvider used for testing purposes.

classes.name: StripeProvider
classes.description: Implementation of PaymentProvider interfacing with Stripe payment service.

classes.name: RazorpayProvider
classes.description: Implementation of PaymentProvider interfacing with Razorpay payment service.

methods.name: PaymentProvider get_payment_provider()
methods.description: Factory function that returns the active payment provider based on application settings.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_session(self, user_id: str, book_id: str, amount_cents: int, currency: str)
Dict[str,Any] verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, headers: Dict[str, str])

ctags.name: create_session
ctags.pattern: /^    def create_session(self, user_id: str, book_id: str, amount_cents: int, currency: str) -> Di/
ctags.signature: (self, user_id: str, book_id: str, amount_cents: int, currency: str)
